name: Angry square swing
description:
Angry square swing is a scary horror style arcade, where you have to escape circular saws by taping on your screen.

How to play:
Tap on the screen to start. Player will start bouncing from the left wall to the right and back. To avoid saws you must gain altitude with tapping on the screen.

Features:
- horror themed
- scary and creepy music
- simple gameplay and user interface

Angry square swing is not suitable for children.(It's a horror game that contains blood and saws)

Like Angry square swing? Give it a rate and a review.
